name: Raiding By Myself
description:
Background

Have you ever gotten invited to be a multiplayer game just to have people not turn up? or are you unable to find the perfect co-op partner? Well you’re in luck! This subterranean dungeon has got you covered!

This game allows you to record your actions and play it back in 10 second loops!

Do you think you have what it takes to clear every level?

Made for LDJAM 51!

Controls
  • WASD - movement
  • Mouse - Pan camera
  • Mouse (Left click) - Shoot/Fire Projectile
  • R - Create new recording of your actions
  • E - Playback all recordings of your actions
  • ESC - bring up the Pause MENU (TIP: you can modify mouse sensitivity here!)
  • Space - skip dialogue
